name: ReadWriteThink Timeline
summary: Learn about .RWT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: RWT Timeline is primarily designed for use by students and teachers in the school setting. It allows you to create a timeline of an event or process that displays in sequence along a line. You can organize timelines by date, time of day, or event. RWT files allow you to save your timeline and reopen later to edit. When you finish your timeline you can save it as a .PDF file.

description: An RWT file is a timeline created by RWT Timeline, an iOS app that allows users to make a graphical representation of related items or events. It contains a timeline, which includes events, times, event descriptions, and images. RWT files can be opened using the Timeline web program or the iOS Timeline app.
